com.highsoft.highcharts.common

Class HIColor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.highsoft.highcharts.common.HIColor

  • public class HIColor
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides color management in chart. Initiate colors by its static methods.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Object getData()
      Method used in the HIGChartsClasses to get the gradient color
      static HIColor initWithHexValue(java.lang.String hex)
      Standard hex color value, for example FFFFFF for black and 000000 for white

      CSS-style linear gradient
      static HIColor initWithName(java.lang.String name)
      Standard color names: red, green, black etc.
      static HIColor initWithRadialGradient(HIGradient gradient, java.util.LinkedList<HIStop> stops)
      CSS-style radial gradient
      static HIColor initWithRGB(int red, int green, int blue)
      Values of red, green and blue color in RGB standard: values 0-255
      static HIColor initWithRGBA(int red, int green, int blue, double alpha)
      Values of red, green and blue color in RGBa standard.
